name: Patient Patient!
description:
Patient Patient!

You are a Patient at a Doctors office

Utilizing two viewing windows, users will have to determine the correct combination of hat and shoes to identify their assigned doctor.

As doctors pass by the viewing windows, users will have to be patient and approach the counter once they identify the correct combination that matches their doctor's description.

Upon successfully choosing to call for their doctor by approaching the service desk and pressing the space bar, users will be reloaded into the lobby as a new patient.

Doctors will pass by at a faster speed, as the user matches patients and doctors in succession.

Good luck, and remember to be Patient, Patient!

MADE IN 3 HOURS FOR TRIJAM 193 - Patience Theme

Controls:

A=Left

D=Right

Space= Interaction at service desk

U/I:

Start the game by clicking on Start

Restart will restart the game

Credits will go to Credits page
